Today, during the meeting of the Council of Ministers, the Presidency of the Presidency adopted the establishment of a coordinating council for industry in the country from 13 federal and local authorities. Https://t.co/0QU5bW59zK
The contribution of the industrial sector to our annual GDP exceeds 220 billion dirhams. Our goal is to reach 400 billion dirhams in 2021.

The objective of the Board is to launch incentive programs for investors, coordinate industry priorities for each Emirate and harmonize state industrial plans with their educational and knowledge plans
We also adopted today the program of early medical examination of cancer for citizens of the state with the aim of detecting the disease in its early stages, and God and you are evil diseases
We also adopted a comprehensive program to enhance the attractiveness of the profession of nursing to citizens .. National nursing cadres are the real support of the state in times of crisis and need
